item.title: Steam World Dig
item.description: Picked this indie retro style platform game for my Playstation 5 cheap recently. It was released in 2013, so old now but still a good play. Links Game Wiki

item.title: BBC Twitter Bot Fun
item.description: More fun playing with BBC Twitter Bot. Source: https://t.co/ks0jhudxdM pic.twitter.com/7AHXAV6oud — @bbcmicrobot@mastodon.me.uk (@bbcmicrobot) January 19, 2022 Source: https://t.co/xBabCMPWCX pic.twitter.com/R2wifhK7I7 — @bbcmicrobot@mastodon.me.uk (@bbcmicrobot) January 19, 2022 Source: https://t.co/jVpUMLBa8D pic.twitter.com/W9AozQlY0y — @bbcmicrobot@mastodon.me.uk (@bbcmicrobot) January 19, 2022 Source: https://t.co/Rt3DOf1FOh pic.twitter.com/KUK7hiq7if — @bbcmicrobot@mastodon.me.uk (@bbcmicrobot) January 19, 2022

item.title: 10 PRINT6502
item.description: BBC Micro machine code take on C64 10 Print one line random pattern generator. Code at Github 10print.asm 10 PRINT 6502 \ 10 PRINT \ Using BeebASM assembler \ (c) Alastair Montgomery INCLUDE "../lib/constants.asm" seed = &70 ORG &2000 .start LDA #23 STA seed LDA #63 STA seed+1 LDX #0 .char LDA chartable, X JSR oswrch INX CPX #23 BNE char .loop JSR random BMI two .one LDA #224 JMP print .

item.title: 10 PRINT
item.description: BBC Micro take on C64 10 Print one line random pattern generator. 10 MODE 0 20 N=RND(1):IF N > 0.5 THEN PRINT "/"; ELSE PRINT "\"; 30 GOTO 20 RUN pic.twitter.com/xQag2GKwx0 — @bbcmicrobot@mastodon.me.uk (@bbcmicrobot) September 4, 2020

item.title: Golden Tail and Kitsune's Curse New Retro Game
item.description: New retro game, looks worth getting a Amstrad CPC emulator setup to play it. Video Source Retro Collection Juan’s games: (https://www.usebox.net/jjm/) Buy physical copies of these games: Golden Tail Kitsune Curse

item.title: Mree
item.description: Mr. Ee from Micro Power for the BBC Micro nice variation on the Pacman theme. Play Online at BBC Mirco

item.title: The Pit New Retro Game
item.description: New retro game, looks worth getting a Commodore emulator setup to play it. This style of game is one of my favorites, loved Boulder Dash and Repton. Video Source Retro Collection The Pit Download Play Online

item.title: Retro Gaming Commando
item.description: One of the games I loved playing in my youth on my BBC Micro, I’m still rubbish at it to this day. Links Play Online at BBC Mirco Game FAQs
